sourcesContent:
const plantsData = [
    {
        name: "Monstera Deliciosa",
        description: "A stunning tropical plant known for its large, split leaves and climbing nature. Perfect as a statement piece in any room.",
        image: "/images/plants/monstera.jpg",
        careInstructions: [
            "Water when top 2-3 inches of soil feels dry",
            "Provide bright, indirect light",
            "Maintain humidity around 60%",
            "Fertilize monthly during growing season"
        ],
        conditions: [
            "Indirect Light",
            "Moderate Water",
            "High Humidity",
            "Well-draining Soil"
        ],
        origin: "Southern Mexico and Panama"
    },
    {
        name: "Snake Plant",
        description: "An extremely hardy plant that thrives on neglect. Known for its air-purifying qualities and striking vertical leaves.",
        image: "/images/plants/snake-plant.jpg",
        careInstructions: [
            "Allow soil to dry between waterings",
            "Tolerates low to bright indirect light",
            "Can handle low humidity",
            "Fertilize 2-3 times per year"
        ],
        conditions: [
            "Adaptable Light",
            "Low Water",
            "Low Humidity",
            "Any Well-draining Soil"
        ],
        origin: "West Africa"
    },
    {
        name: "Fiddle Leaf Fig",
        description: "A popular indoor tree with large, violin-shaped leaves. Makes a dramatic statement in any space.",
        image: "/images/plants/fiddle-leaf.jpg",
        careInstructions: [
            "Water when top inch of soil is dry",
            "Bright, indirect light is best",
            "Rotate regularly for even growth",
            "Wipe leaves to remove dust"
        ],
        conditions: [
            "Bright Light",
            "Moderate Water",
            "Medium Humidity",
            "Rich Soil"
        ],
        origin: "Western Africa"
    }
];

export default plantsData;
